from disk (ie. the case where r->finfo.st_mode == 0), unless it is

author: martin
msg: Proxy is not installed by default: don't configure ProxyVia

msg: Move buffer allocation test behind the 'simple' tests

author: coar
msg: Put an explanation of *why* the "500 Server Error" condition
occurred during CGI processing into the *ERROR_NOTES envariable
so ErrorDocument scripts can be more descriptive if they so desire.

msg: Mention new Via: and Max-Forwards: headers of Apache-1.3.2
